EmailTemplate.subject: Launderers & Renters for DuPont™ Nomex® Industrial Apparel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/assets/downloads/nomex/h71603launderingguidefornomexaramidfiber.pdf
Below you will find the web address for companies that are Launderers & Renters for Nomex® Industrial Apparel.
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=4&prodNum=4
Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
